src: Yongeyeho ati: "Ubu dufite imbeba z'amezi 4 zidafite diyabete ariko zahoze zirwaye diyabete."
mt: 4 days ago we had a patient with diabetes but they were not diabetic.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, umwarimu wigisha ubuvuzi muri kaminuza ya Dalhousie iherereye i Halifax, muri Nova Scotia akaba n’umuyobozi w’ishami ry’ubuvuzi n’ubumenyi mu Ishyirahamwe ry’abarwanya Diyabete ryo muri Kanada, yatanze umuburo ko ubushakashatsi bukiri mu ntangiriro zabwo.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a Dalhousie University professor in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association, announced the discovery of a new diabetes treatment.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Kimwe n'abandi bahanga, ashidikanya ku kuba diyabete ishobora kuvurwa, avuga ko ibi byavuye mu bushakashatsi ntaho bihuriye n'abantu basanzwe barwaye diyabete yo mu bwoko bwa 1.
mt: 1 in 3 people with diabetes can be cured, says study, but how many people with type 1 diabetes are there?
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Kuri uyu wa mbere ubwo yari kuri radiyo yitwa Sveriges muri Suwede, Sara Danius, umunyamabanga uhoraho muri komite ya Nobeli ishinzwe ubuvanganzo mu ishuri rya Suwede, yatangaje ku mugaragaro ko iyi komite itashoboye kugera kuri Bob Dylan ako kanya ku bijyanye no kwegukana igihembo cyitiriwe Nobel mu buvanganzo cy’umwaka wa 2016, yari yaragize intege nke zo kumugeraho.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, announced on Swedish radio that the academy had decided to award the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature to Bob Dylan, who was reached by phone.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius yaravuze ati: "Ubu ntacyo turimo gukora. Maze guhamagara no koherereza imeri umufatanyabikorwa we wa hafi cyane nuko nakira ibisubizo byiza cyane. Kugeza ubu, ibyo birahagije rwose."
mt: "We are working on it. I am going to meet with him and we will discuss the issues in detail. For now, it is a priority."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Mbere y’aho, Umuyobozi mukuru wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, yavuze ko isosiyete yatangiye igihe inzogera ye y’umuryango itumvikanaga mu iduka rye riri mu igarage rye.
mt: Before that, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company had stopped its partnership with the organization after the incident.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Yavuze ko yubatse inzogera yo ku muryango ikoresha murandasi nziramugozi.
mt: He said he was trying to save the lives of the crew.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff yavuze ko ibyagurishijwebyiyongereye nyuma y’uko mu mwaka wa 2013 agaragaye mu gice cya Shark Tank aho itsinda ryerekanaga ryangaga gutera inkunga iyo sosiyete nshya.
mt: Siminoff said the company was inspired by the success of Shark Tank in 2013, when the startup received a $100,000 investment from the show's investors.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Mu mpera za 2017, Siminoff yagaragaye ku muyoboro wa televiziyo ihahirwaho QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Na none kandi, inteko yakemuye ikirego hamwe n’isosiyete ishinzwe umutekano yarushanwaga, ADT Corporation.
mt: And, the committee overseeing the project, ADT Corporation, was also fined.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Mu gihe urukingo rumwe rw’ubushakashatsi rwagaragara ko rushobora kugabanya imfu za Ebola, kugeza ubu, nta muti uragaragazwa neza ko ushobora kuvura ubwandu busanzwe.
mt: While one study suggests that a drug may be able to treat Ebola, to date, no drug has been proven to cure the disease.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Ikinyobwa kimwe kirimo abasirikare b’umubiri, ZMapp, cyabanje kugaragaza icyizere aho cyakoreshwaga, ariko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe bwerekanye ko nta musaruro gitanga nkuko byari byitezwe mu gukumira urupfu.
mt: 1 of 4 experimental Ebola treatments, ZMapp, has shown some promise, but a study of its effectiveness has found it had no effect on survival.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Mu igerageza rya PALM, ZMapp yakoreshejwe nk'ishinzwe kugenzura, bivuze ko abahanga mu bya siayansi bayikoresheje nk'iyo bagomba gushingiraho kandi bayigereranya n’ubundi buryo butatu bwo kuvura.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a treatment, researchers say they used the same approach as the one used in the trial and combined it with another treatment.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Itsinda ry’abakinnyi b’imikino ngororangingo ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika rishyigikiye ibaruwa ya Komite Olempike yo muri Amerika kandi ryemera ko umuryango wa Olempike ukenewe cyane mu guteza imbere imibereho yizewe y’abakinnyi bacu bose.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee delegation has arrived in London and is meeting with the International Olympic Committee to discuss the future of the Olympic movement.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Turemeranya n’itangazo rya USOC rivuga ko inyungu z’abakinnyi bacu n'amakipe yacu, na siporo yabo, zishobora kwitabwaho neza binyuze mu gukomeza gushiraho impinduka zifatika mu muryango wacu, aho kugira ngo uvanweho.
mt: 2016 USOC statement that our athletes and their teams, and our sport, can benefit from the lessons learned in our community, where we can all grow.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Itsinda ry’abakinnyi ngororamubiri rya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rishyigikiye iperereza ryigenga rishobora kugaragaza ukuri ku ihohoterwa rikomeye ryavuzweho ubutwari n’abacitse ku icumu rya Larry Nassar ryashoboye kutaramenyekana igihe kinini kandi ryakira impinduka zose zikenewe kandi zikwiye.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee has hired a law firm to investigate the sexual abuse scandal involving former USA Gymnastics team doctor Larry Nassar, who was sentenced to up to 175 years in prison for abusing young female athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Itsinda ry’abakinnyi ngororamubiri ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na USOC bafite intego imwe - gutuma siporo y’abakina imikino ngororamubiri, n’abandi, bagira umutekano ushoboka kugira ngo abakinnyi bagere ku nzozi zabo bari ahantu hatekanye, heza kandi hashyizweho imbaraga.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee and USA Gymnastics have a new goal: to make the sport of gymnastics safer for athletes, and to prevent abuse.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Mu myaka y’1960, Brzezinski yakoreye John F. Kennedy nk'umujyanama we maze nyuma ajya mu buyobozi bwa Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and later to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Mu majonjora yabaye mu 1976, yagiriye inama Carter kuri politiki y’ububanyi n’amahanga, nyuma aza kuba umujyanama ku bijyanye n’umutekano mu gihugu (NSA) kuva 1977 kugeza 1981, asimbuye Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, he served on the National Security Council under President Carter, as deputy director of the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) from 1977 to 1981, and as Secretary of State under President Reagan from 1981 to 1989.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Nka NSA, yafashije Carter mu gukemura ibibazo bya diplomasi mu bikorwa by’isi, nk’amasezerano ya Camp David, 1978; kuzahura umubano wa Amerika n’ Ubushinwa wagejeje mu mpera z’ 1970; Impinduramatwara ya Irani, yatumye habaho ikibazo cy’abafashwe bugwate muri Irani, 1979; n'igitero cy'Abasoviyeti muri Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: As NSA, he helped Carter resolve diplomatic issues in the 1970s, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; the normalization of relations between the United States and China, 1979; the Iranian Hostage Crisis, which led to the release of American hostages in Iran, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filime, irimo Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone, yagize abatorwanywa mu byiciro byose by’ingenzi.
mt: 2016 film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone was nominated for all four major awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling na Stone batoranyijwe nk’umukinnyi mwiza w’umugabo n'uw’igitsina gore wa filime uko bakurikirana.
mt: Gosling and Stone were cast as the male and female leads in the film, which they co-produced.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Mu bindi byatoranyijwe harimo Ishusho Nziza, Umuyobozi, Imitunganiyirizwe y’amashusho, Uko imyambarire imeze, Imitunganyirizwe ya filime, Amanota y’umwimerere, Igishushanyo mbonera, Gutunganya amajwi, Kuvanga amajwi no kwerekana umwimerere.
mt: 1. Beautiful Pictures, 2. Director, 3. Film Editor, 4. Sound Recording, 5. Sound Mixing, 6. Sound Effects, 7. Dubbing, 8. Subtitles.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Indirimbo ebyiri zo muri filime, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na City of Stars, zatoranyijwe nk’indirimbo z’umwimerere. Sitidiyo ya Lionsgate yatoranyijwe inshuro 26 — kurusha izindi sitidiyo.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for Best Original Song. The Lionsgate film was nominated for 26 awards.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Ku cyumweru washize, mu ijambo rye abinyujije ku munyamabanga w’itangazamakuru, Perezida wa Leta Zunze za Amerika, Donald Trump yatangaje ko ingabo z’Amerika zari kuva muri Siriya.
mt: On Sunday, in a speech to a group of journalists, the President of the United States, Donald Trump announced that American troops are in Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Itangazo ryanditswe nyuma y’uko Trump aganiriye kuri terefone na Perezida wa Turkey, Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: Trump was seen on a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Na none iryo tangazo rivuga ko Turukiya yari gutangira kurinda abarwanyi ba ISIS bafashwe, kandi ko ibihugu by’i Burayi byanze gutaha.
mt: The announcement came as Turkey was preparing to repatriate captured ISIS fighters, and as European countries were preparing to take them back.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Ibi ntibishimangira gusa ko byibuze dinazoru zimwe zifite amababa, igitekerezo kimaze gukwirakwira, ariko gitanga ibisobanuro birambuye ku bisigazwa by’ibinyabuzima muri rusange ko bidashoboka, nk’ibara n’uburyo butatu bishyirwa mu byiciro.
mt: This is not to say that the study is perfect, but it does provide some useful information on the effects of the environment on the health of animals in general, such as the effects of air pollution and the three main causes of death.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Abahanga mu bya siyansi bavuga ko ibaba ry’iyi nyamanswa ryari umutuku wijimye-ryirabura hejuru naho ku gice cyo hepfo hari ibara ryerurutse cyangwa umuhondo.
mt: Scientists say the fossil is a juvenile dinosaur, with the tail being the only part of the body that had fully developed.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Ubushakashatsi butanga kandi ubushishozi mu mihindagurikire y’amababa y’inyoni.
mt: The study also found that the birds' feathers are a good source of protein.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Kubera ko amababa ya dinazoru adafite ibano rihagije neza, ryitwa umugongo w’ibaba, ariko rifite ibindi bintu biranga amababa -aribyo barbs na barbules - abashakashatsi bavuze ko umugongo w’ibaba ushobora kuba warageze aho ukihinduranya.
mt: Because the dinosaur bones are so fragile, the skull is broken, but the bones - the ribs and vertebrae - can be preserved, researchers say.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Imiterere y’amababa yerekana ko itakoreshejwe mu kuguruka ahubwo yakoreshejwe mukugenzura ubushyuhe cyangwa kwerekana. Abashakashatsi bavuze ko, nubwo uyu ari umurizo wa dinazoru ikiri nto, ubushakashatsi bw’ibanze bwerekana ko ari ibaba rikuze ntabwo ari ibaba ryo hasi ry’inyoni.
mt: The researchers say the dinosaur's tail was used for balance and not for flight. Although the dinosaur is a dinosaur, the study found that it was not a bird.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Abashakashatsi bavuze ko, nubwo uyu ari umurizo wa dinazoru ikiri nto, ubushakatsatsi bw’ibanze bwerekana ko ari ibaba rikuze ntabwo ari ibaba ryo hasi ry’inyoni.
mt: The researchers say, although this is a dinosaur egg, the embryonic remains suggest it is a bird egg.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Ejo mu gitondo, imodoka yari itezemo igisasu yaturikiye ku cyicaro gikuru cya polisi i Gaziantep, muri Turikiya maze gihitana abapolisi babiri kinakomeretsa abandi bantu barenga makumyabiri.
mt: On Sunday, a truck carrying a load of explosives crashed into a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring 15 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Ibiro bya guverineri byavuze ko mu bantu bakomeretse, cumi n'icyenda ari abapolisi.
mt: 15 people were injured, including 5 police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polisi yavuze ko umurwanyi wa Daesh (ISIL) ariwe ukekwaho kugira uruhare muri icyo gitero.
mt: Police say the Daesh (ISIL) fighter is believed to have been involved in the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Basanze izuba rikora ku mahame shingiro amwe nk’izindi nyenyeri: Igikorwa cy’inyenyeri zose muri sisitemu cyasanzwe gitwarwa no kumurika kwazo, kuzenguruka, ntakindi.
mt: The other aircraft in the system are also equipped with a black box: The system is designed to record and store data, including flight path, speed, and altitude.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Umucyo no kuzunguruka bikoreshwa hamwe kugira ngo umenye umubare Rossby y’inyenyeri, ifitanye isano no gutemba kwa gazi yok u izuba.
mt: A Rossby wave is a large-scale wave that propagates along the direction of the Coriolis force, which is perpendicular to the direction of the wind. The Coriolis force is a fictitious force that arises from the rotation of the Earth. The Coriolis force is responsible for the deflection of winds towards the right in the Northern Hemisphere and towards the left in the Southern Hemisphere.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Uko umubare wa Rossby uba muto, niko inyenyeri itaka cyane ku bijyanye na rukuruzi ihinduka.
mt: As the Rossby number increases, the flow becomes increasingly dominated by the Coriolis force.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Lwasaki yahuye n'ibibazo inshuro nyinshi ubwo yari mu rugendo rwe
mt: The car was involved in several accidents during its journey
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Yambuwe na ba rushimusi, imbwa irwaye ibisazi iramwibasira muri Tibet, ubukwe bwe burafa muri Nepal kandi yafungiwe mu Buhinde.
mt: It was captured by hunters, a leopard that was spotted in Tibet, its native habitat in Nepal, and released in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Impuzandengo ya 802.11n ikora kuri 2.4Ghz ndetse na 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Ibi bizayemerera gusubira inyuma ikorere hamwe na 802.11a, 802.11b na 802.11g, gusa hari amaradiyo abiri kuri sitasiyo fatizo.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are supported, but there are two special frequencies.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Umuvuduko wa 802.11n urihuta cyane kuruta uw’uwababanjirije hamwe n’ingano y’umurimo ntarengwa wa 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n is backwards compatible with 802.11a/b/g and can achieve up to 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall washakanye n'abana babiri bakuze, ntabwo yasize igitekerezo cye kuri Miller, uwo nkuru yari yerekeyeho.
mt: Duvall was survived by his wife and two children, and had no known connection to Miller, who was also deceased.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Asabwe kugira icyo yabivugaho, Miller yaravuze ati: "Mike avuga amagambo menshi mu gihe cy'iburanisha...Nari niteguye bityo rero mu by’ukuri sinumvaga ibyo yavugaga."
mt: In response to Miller's statement, Miller said, "Mike says a lot of things in the heat of the moment...I'm not going to get into that, but I will say that what he said was not true."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Hu yaravuze ati: "Tuzagerageza kugabanya ibyuka bya karuboni kuri buri gice cya GDP ku buryo bugaragara muri 2020 tugendeye ku gipimo cya 2005."
mt: "We are committed to reducing carbon emissions by 20% of GDP by 2020, based on 2005 levels."
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Ntabwo yashyize ikimenyetso kuri utwo duce, avuga ko bizakorwa hagendewe ku bukungu bw’Ubushinwa.
mt: He said the company would continue to operate in China.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu yashishikarije ibihugu biri mu nzira y'amajyambere "kurwanya inzira ya kera yo kwanduza ubundi ugasukura nyuma."
mt: He said the countries in the front line "to stop the spread of the disease to others."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Yongeyeho ati "nyamara, ntibagomba gusabwa gufata amategeko adahuye n’icyiciro cy’iterambere ryabo, inshingano n'ubushobozi."
mt: "We are not going to be allowed to do what we want, our mandate, our mission."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Ariko mu gihe uburinganire bw’amanywa n’ijoro bubaho kabiri mu mwaka ku isi, Saturune ifata imyaka 29.7 y’ isi kugira ngo izenguruke izuba bityo ibyabaye ntibikunze kubaho.
mt: 29.7 days is the average length of a year on Earth, so the days are not always the same length.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Iraburira ko ntawe ushobora kwemeza ko igikorwa icyo ari cyo cyose muri iki gihe muri Iraki gishobora guhagarika intambara z’amacakubiri, kwiyongera k’urugomo, cyangwa ibiganisha ku rujijo.
mt: It is possible that the current situation in Iraq could lead to a civil war, further instability, or a complete breakdown of the government.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Raporo itangira isaba ibiganiro byeruye no gushyiraho ubwumvikane muri Leta Zunze ubumwe za Amerika kuri politiki ivuga ku bihugu byo mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.
mt: The report begins with a series of questions and answers on American foreign policy towards countries in the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Raporo iranegura cyane hafi ya buri ngingo ya politiki y’ubuyobozi bwa Iraki kandi irasaba ko habaho guhindura icyerekezo byihuse.
mt: The report is expected to be presented to the Iraqi government in its entirety and is expected to recommend a change in strategy.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Icya mbere mu byifuzo byayo 78 ni uko hakwiye gufatwa ingamba nshya ku ruhare rwa demokarasi mbere y’uko uyu mwaka urangira mu bijyanye no kurinda imipaka ya Iraki ibitero ndetse no kongera kugirana umubano mwiza n’abaturanyi bayo.
mt: 78 of their demands are that they have been given a new deadline to end the occupation of Iraq and to restore a fair and just relationship with the Iraqi people.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Ku mugoroba w’ejo, umuseneteri uriho akaba Madamu wa Perezida wa Arijantine, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner yatangaje kandidatire ye ya perezida i La Plata, umujyi uri ku birometero 50 (mayilo 31) uvuye i Buenos Aires.
mt: On Sunday, the country's first lady, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for president in La Plata, a city about 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Ari mu nzu yerekanirwamo imikino ya Arijantine, madamu Kirchner yatangaje ko yifuza kwiyamamariza kuba perezida, muri iriya nzu ni hamwe yiyamamarije muri Sena muri 2005 nk'umwe mu bahagarariye intara ya Buenos Aires.
mt: She is currently under house arrest in her home, where she was arrested in 2005 as one of the senators representing the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Ikiganiro cyatangijwe n'intambara zerekeye amafaranga yo kugoboka no kwiyubaka nyuma y’inkubi y’umuyaga Katrina; ibyo bamwe mu baharanira inyungu za rubanda banditseho urwenya babyita "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
mt: The debate was over the funding of the rebuilding of New Orleans after Hurricane Katrina; some critics called it "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Abanenga ibikorwa byo kwiyubaka bibanze ku itangwa ry’amasezerano yo kwiyubaka ku bantu baba muri Washington.
mt: The signatories of the agreement to relocate the people of Washington are now in the process of implementing it.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Abantu barenga miliyoni enye bagiye i Roma gushyingura.
mt: 1 million people are expected to attend.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Abantu bari bahari bari benshi cyane ku buryo bitashobokaga ko buri wese abasha kugera muri St. Peter's Square aho umuhango wo gushyingura waberaga.
mt: 100,000 people are expected to attend the event, where the Pope will deliver a speech.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Ahantu henshi i Roma hashyizwe insakazamashusho nini cyane za televiziyo kugira ngo abantu barebe ibirori.
mt: In Rome, the streets are filled with television cameras to cover the event.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: No mu yindi mijyi myinshi yo mu Butaliyani n’ahandi hasigaye ku isi, cyane muri Polonye, ​​hashyizweho ibintu nk'ibyo, abantu benshi bakaba barabirebaga.
mt: In many cities in Germany and other countries, including Poland, people were seen wearing the same things, such as this.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Abanyamateka banenze politiki ya kera ya FBI yibandaga ku manza zari zoroshye gukemura, nk’imanza z’imodoka zibwe, bikaba byarakorwaga hagamijwe kuzamura igipimo cyo kugera ku nsinzi kw’ikigo.
mt: FBI officials said the agency is working to secure, among other things, car dealerships, which were targeted because of their ability to generate large amounts of cash.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Mu ngengo y’imari ya 2005, kongere yatangiye gushyigikira gahunda iteye isoni, ikavuga ko FBI igomba guha abakozi 10 amafilimi y’urukozasoni.
mt: 2005 budget, Congress authorized a program to pay informants, saying the FBI must pay 10 percent of the cost of a film.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa yinjije amanota yo hejuru, mu mipira 41 gusa yirutse inshuro 70 maze akubita 11 bine na 2 esheshatu.
mt: 41-year-old Robin Uthappa scored a century in just 70 balls, with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Abakinnyi bo hagati, Sachin Tendulkar na Rahul Dravid, bitwaye neza kandi birukankana bafatanyije.
mt: The two batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, were both out for ducks.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Ariko, Ubuhinde bwatsinze ibitego 36 gusa nyuma yo gutakaza igitego cya kapiteni bitakaza 7 kugirango birangire.
mt: 36 points were scored, but the captain's goal was disallowed to make it 7-0.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: George W. Bush, perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yageze muri Singapore tariki ya 16 Ugushyingo mu gitondo, mu gutangira urugendo rwo kuzenguruka Aziya ruzamara icyumweru.
mt: 16th President of the United States George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on Monday, beginning a tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Ageze Singapore yakiriwe na Wong Kan Seng, minisitiri w’intebe wungirije maze aganira na Lee Hsien Loong, Minisitiri w’intebe wa Singapore ku bibazo by’ubucuruzi n’iterabwoba.
mt: Singapore was visited by Wong Kan Seng, Minister for Foreign Affairs, and Lee Hsien Loong, Prime Minister of Singapore, on trade and security issues.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Bush yabwiye abari bamuteze amatwi ku bijyanye no kwagura ubucuruzi muri Aziya, nyuma yo kumara icyumweru atsindwa mu matora yo hagati.
mt: The president told businessmen at a meeting on trade and investment in Asia that he was confident of winning the election.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Stephen Harper, minisitiri w’intebe yemeye kohereza amategeko ya guverinoma ‘agenga kubungabunga ikirere’ kuri komite z’amashyaka yose kugira ngo ayasome, mbere y’isomwa ryayo rya kabiri, nyuma y’iminota 25 yo ku wa kabiri n’umuyobozi wa NDP, Jack Layton kuri PMO.
mt: Stephen Harper, the prime minister, was seen delivering the government's "green" budget to all parliamentary committees for review, before the second reading, after 25 minutes on Tuesday, February 24, and NDP leader Jack Layton at PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Mu nama yagiranye na Minisitiri w’intebe, Layton yari yasabye ko hahindurwa umushinga w'itegeko ryita ku bidukikije, asaba ko "byandikwa neza kandi byuzuye”.
mt: In a meeting with Environment Minister Layton, he was asked about the progress of the environmental legislation, and replied that "it is written well and will be implemented".
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Kuva guverinoma yatangira gufata inkunga y'ibitaro bya Mersey muri Devonport, ho muri Tasmaniya, guverinoma ndetse n'abadepite bamwe bo muri federasiyo banenze iki gikorwa nk'intambwe ibanziriza amatora ya federasiyo azaba mu Gushyingo.
mt: From when the government began building the Mersey River dams in Devonport, Tasmania, the government and some members of parliament have opposed the project as a waste of federal funds.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: John Howard, minisitiri w’intebe yavuze ko iki gikorwa kigamije gusa kurinda ibikoresho by’ibitaro kudateshwa agaciro na guverinoma ya Tasmaniya, mu gutanga miliyoni 45 z’amadolari y’Amerika.
mt: Australian Prime Minister John Howard said the move was aimed at protecting Tasmanian industries from government subsidies, worth about US$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Abareba imihindagurikire y’inyanja bagaragaje ko habaye tsunami nk’uko itangazo riheruka gusohoka ribivuga. Hari ibimenyetso bimwe bya tsunami byagaragaye hafi ya Pago Pago na Niue.
mt: Residents of low-lying areas were evacuated after a tsunami warning was issued. There were reports of tsunami waves near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Muri Tonga, nta raporo yatanzwe ko hari ibyangiritse cyangwa abakomeretse cyane, ariko ingufu zarabuze by’agahe gato bikaba byarabujije abayobozi ba Tongan kwakira imbuzi ya tsunami itanzwe na PTWC.
mt: In Tonga, no reports of damage or injuries have been made, but the tsunami warning was issued by the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Amashuri cumi n’ane yo muri Hawaii ari ku nyanya cyangwa ari hafi yayo yarafunzwe kuwa gatatu nubwo imiburo ya tsunami yari yagaragaye.
mt: 10 schools in Hawaii were closed on Monday, although the tsunami was not expected to reach the islands.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, George W. Bush, yishimiye iri tangazo.
mt: President of the United States, George W. Bush, has been informed of this incident.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Gordon Johndroe, umuvugizi wa Bush, yavuze ko isezerano rya Koreya ya Ruguru "ari intambwe ikomeye iganisha ku ntego yo kugabanya intwaro za kirimbuzi ku kigobe cya Koreya."
mt: "This is a major step forward in our efforts to reduce the threat of proliferation of nuclear weapons," said White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Icya cumi cyiswe incubi y’umuyaga w’igihe cy’umuyaga wa Atlantike, Subtropical Storm Jerry, cyashinzwe mu nyanja ya Atalantika uyu munsi.
mt: The tenth named storm of the season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, was formed in the Atlantic Ocean on Monday.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Ikigo cy’igihugu kirwanya incubi y’umuyaga (NHC) kivuga ko kuri ubu Jerry itakibangamiye ubutaka.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) reports that Jerry has entered the Atlantic.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Ingabo za Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika zagereranije ko santimetero 15.24 z’imvura zishobora kurenga imirongo yangiritse mbere.
mt: 15.24 inches of snow is expected to fall before the storm ends.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: The Ninth Ward, yabonye umwuzure ugera kuri metero 6.096 mu gihe cy’inkubi y’umuyaga witwa Katrina, kuri ubu uri mu mazi maremare kuko irukuta rutangira amazi rwari hafi kurengerwa.
mt: 6.096 meters of water flooded the Ninth Ward during Hurricane Katrina, which is now a lake because the levees were breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Amazi arimo kwisuka hejuru y’urukuta rutangira amazi mu gice cya metero 30.48 z'ubugari.
mt: 30.48 meters of water is expected to rise above the meter.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Adam Cuerden, umuyobozi wa Commons, yavuzeko ababajwe no kuba yarabisibye ubwo yavuganaga na Wikinews mu kwezi gushize.
mt: Adam Cuerden, the Commons administrator, has been banned from editing for a week after he was found to have been editing Wikinews in the past month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: Ikigaragara, kuva mu ntangiriro Wales yaratubeshye. Icya mbere, akora nk'aho iki cyatewe impamvu zemewe n’amategeko. Icya kabiri, akigaragaza nkaho atwumva, kugeza ubwo igihangano cye gisibwe"
mt: 1. It is in Wales, but it is not the first time. 2. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 3. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 4. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 5. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 6. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 7. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 8. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 9. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 10. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 11. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 12. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 13. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 14. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 15. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 16. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 17. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 18. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 19. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 20. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 21. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 22. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 23. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 24. It is a story about how I came to be here, and why I am here. 25. It is a story about how I came to be here
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Kurakara kw'abaturage byatumye hashyirwaho umushinga wa politiki ukubiyemo ingamba zerekeye iby’ibyimibonano mpuzabitsina ku rubuga rwakira amamiriyoni y'ibitangazamakuru.
mt: The public outcry forced the government to suspend the project, which was to be run by the Ministry of Information and Communications.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Imirimo yakozwe ahanini yari iy'amagambo, ariko gahunda yanditswe kugirango iteze imbere ibyakozwe n’itsinda ry’inyenyeri ya Sagittarius.
mt: The project was designed to improve the performance of Sagittarius' teams.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Ingaruka itsinda ryashakishaga ryaterwa n’ingufu z’amazi hagati y’igice cy’umwijima w’itsinda ry’inyenyeri hamwe n’igice cy’umwijima kuri Milky Way.
mt: The collision of a meteorite with the Milky Way galaxy's disk.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Nkuko ukwezi gukurura isi, bigatera imiraba, niko Milk Way ikoresha imbaraga ku tsinda ry’inyenyeri ryitwa Sagittarius.
mt: As the night sky clears, the Milky Way galaxy shines with the light of the stars in the constellation Sagittarius.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Abahanga ba siyansi bashoboye kwemeza ko igice cy’umwijima kigira ingaruka ku bindi bintu byijimye nkuko bijya bigenda ku bintu bisanzwe.
mt: Scientists have discovered that a small part of the brain has an effect on other things that it is not supposed to.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Iyi nyigisho ivuga ko ibintu byinshi byijimye bikikije urukurikirane rw’inyenyeri biherereye hafi y’urukurikirane rw’inyenyeri bimeze nk’urumuri rukikije izuba, kandi bikozwe mu bice bito bito.
mt: This article states that many things are affected by the earthquake, including the city's water supply, and that the water is contaminated.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Mu raporo zitangwa na Tereviziyo hagaragaramo umwotsi w’umweru uturuka mu kimera.
mt: The report also included a video of the fire truck's driver getting out of the vehicle.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Umuburo uturuka ku bayobozi b'inzego z'ibanze uravuga ko abaturage baturiye ako gace bagomba kuguma mu ngo, bakazimya ibyuma bikonjesha kandi bakirinda kunywa amazi ya robine.
mt: A local official said residents living near the site should evacuate, and that they should not drink water from the river.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Ibiro by’abashinzwe gutunganya nikeleyeri mu Buyapani bavuga ko basanze caesium na iyode kuri icyo gihingwa.
mt: The Japanese Atomic Energy Agency says it has found cesium and iodine on the site.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Abayobozi bavuga ko ibigega bibamo esanse ya iraniyumu bishobora kuba byaramenetse maze bikaba biri kuva.
mt: Officials say the fuel tanks may have been empty, as they were supposed to be.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Muganga Tony Moll yavumbuye umuti ukaze wo Kurwanya Igituntu (XDR-TB) mu karere ka South Africa KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll has developed a drug to treat XDR-TB in the South African province of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Ubwo yari mu kiganiro avuga kuri ubwo buryo bushya yaravuze ko “buteye ikibazo cyane kandi buraburira kubera umubare w’abahitanwa nabwo."
mt: "We have a big problem and we are overwhelmed by the number of people who are coming."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dr. Moll atekereza ko abarwayi bamwe bashobora kuba baranduye iyo ndwara mu bitaro, kandi byibuze babiri bari abashinzwe ubuzima mu bitaro.
mt: Dr. Moll said some patients may be able to recover from the disease in hospitals, and that two of the infected are hospital workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
